name: Traverse: Starlight & Prairie
overview: Traverse: Starlight & Prairie is an RPG for the Super Famicom and features an open structure where the player can find quests and recruit characters in any order they choose. The game also has a certain focus on star signs, with the player character's birth date defining special abilities they have. The player character and the PCs they recruit can be customized and trained with various weapons and spell types.
